name: MAULD
description:
--- Controls ---

W,A,S,D / Arrow keys - Movement

Spacebar - Jump

Esc - Free mouse

I think  Megadungeons in RPGs are weird and cool. I wanted to see what it could be like to walk around in one in First-Person.  There are no monsters, combat or jump scares, I'm just interested in exploring the feeling of going deeper and deeper into the unknown.

Not sure yet, but I might continue it and add more rooms since it hasn't at all reached that "Mega" level.

Software and Assets used:

  1. Unity
  2. Playmaker [Unity  Asset]
  3. Footstepper [Unity Asset]
  4. Character Movement Fundamentals  [Unity  Asset]
  5. Autodesk Maya
  6. Adobe Substance Designer
  7. Adobe Photoshop
  8. Logic Pro
  9. Footstep sounds - nuFF3 - https://freesound.org/people/nuFF3/
  10. Font - Maria by Basak Yardim - https://www.dafont.com/maria-2.font

Hope you enjoy exploring this space!
